mechanoreception.notes: As echinoderms, they likely possess mechanoreceptors for detecting water currents and substrate vibrations. This is inferred from other brittle stars.

chemoreception.notes: Likely possess chemoreceptors for detecting chemical cues in the water, aiding in food detection and possibly mate recognition. This is inferred from other brittle stars.

photoreception.notes: Photoreception in this family is not documented in the provided context. It is unknown whether they possess light-sensing capabilities.
